title: Seu navegador está sendo gerenciado por nossa organização
content: A mensagem "Seu navegador está sendo gerenciado por nossa organização" fica aparecendo no topo da tela de configurações, além disso não fica disponível a opção de atualizações automáticas sendo exibido um texto falando que essa opção foi desativada pelo administrador.
creator: andre.f.soccol

title: Program FOCUS is non-existant in FF now
content: On starting FF now there is no focus, so other prog's can't e.g. open FF then download or enter a link, etc. directly. That is is a huge nuisance. Also Ctl+H or B (History or Bookmarks) don't work until the cursor is clicked within FF which is a major concentration breaker. Is there something in the settings to give FF focus when it opens like it has always done in the past? I don't like changing things in there without guidance. It's not just me, my wife's laptop is having the same issues.
creator: joe.raine

title: Search Bar issue
content: When i try to search anything in the bottom search bar it shows up in the address bar. Reinstalled browser didn't fix the issue. Please help with fixing the issue as it was working fine until this morning.
creator: mingshenglin

title: Printables.com will not load in Firefox
content:
Title, the site works fine in other browsers and this issue appears to be localised to this site only.

Upon loading the site, everything fails, I can't log in or interact with anything on the site. Clearing cookies and site data from the padlock left of the address bar will successfully load the front page - however clicking on anything or trying to log in will then break the site completely. Even after navigating back to the homepage or restarting the browser the site will remain completely unresponsive until cookies and site data are reset, again presenting only the front page loading correctly and nothing else working.

I have tried using torubleshoot mode and the results are the same, so the issue shouldn't lie with any extensions.

Any ideas? Thanks.
creator: sam.rfrost

title: My tabs are disappearing
content:
All of a sudden starting today when I hide firefox so I can work on documents the tabs I had open are all gone when I bring up the browser back up, I have gone to setting and history and there is no restore previous tabs button as all the fixes suggest,

How do I get this to stop, i have important sites open so I can go back to them and it sucks to keep having to restart and find data again.
creator: MRager20000

title: Satellite maps mirrored diagonally
content:
The satellite imagery on google maps is mirrored diagonally, while the road map displays correctly over it. Win7, Firefox 108.0.2. started happening with Firefox 107.x.x and tried resetting Firefox, but no luck. Satellite imagery displays correctly in troubleshoot mode and private browsing. Cleaned out my cookies and cache, but no dice in regular browser.

Anyone have experience with that?
creator: jon.nellis

title: Firefox benchmark old PC Desktop
content:
I´m using Firefox since many, many years ago. Some days ago I have install this web browser in an old Desktop PC, a Compaq Presario, working with Windows 7 Professional x64, an Intel Core 2 Duo 6300 of 1,87 Ghz, 4 Mb of RAM, 1Gb ethernet adapter with a 1 Gb Router LAN ports and an Internet connection of 300 Mb. Using the same Internet speed test I have observed the following results in differents moments of a day:

Firefox Download speed 130 Mb Opera Download speed 210 Mb Microsoft Edge Download speed 220 Mb Google Chrome Download speed 270 Mb

Firefox can work faster (near the 300 Mb of the Internet provider) with newer Intel processors (Intel i7, for example), but with older Desktop PC its seem not possible. I hope this information can be useful for future developments to allow Firefox to work in a wide variety of Computers.

Thanks so much and Happy New Year to everyone.
creator: enriquespain

title: Custom font I downloaded is popping up on various websites
content:
I downloaded some custom fonts that are extremely stylized, so it works well for art but not so well for actually reading text.

For some reason, Firefox is now replacing the fonts on various websites with one of these fonts, despite having all of my Firefox font settings set to default.
creator: evanlr93
